CI_OnlineResource.name: Download data: Navy Global Environmental Model (NAVGEM), 0.5 degree, Pressure MSL
CI_OnlineResource.description: A web page for specifying a subset of the dataset and downloading data in any of several file formats.

CI_OnlineResource.name: Make a graph or map: Navy Global Environmental Model (NAVGEM), 0.5 degree, Pressure MSL
CI_OnlineResource.description: A web page for creating a graph or map of the data.

CI_OnlineResource.name: OPeNDAP service: Navy Global Environmental Model (NAVGEM), 0.5 degree, Pressure MSL
CI_OnlineResource.description: The base URL for the OPeNDAP service. Add .html to get a web page with a form to download data. Add .dds to get the dataset's structure. Add .das to get the dataset's metadata. Add .dods to download data via the OPeNDAP protocol.

CI_OnlineResource.name: Background information: Navy Global Environmental Model (NAVGEM), 0.5 degree, Pressure MSL
CI_OnlineResource.description: Background information for the dataset.

CI_OnlineResource.name: WMS service: Navy Global Environmental Model (NAVGEM), 0.5 degree, Pressure MSL
CI_OnlineResource.description: The base URL for the WMS service for this dataset.

descript.abstract: Navy Global Environmental Model (NAVGEM) is a global numerical weather prediction computer model. It replaced NOGAPS as the prime model in the middle of February 2013 at the Navy Fleet Numerical Meteorology and Oceanography Center (FNMOC) Weather model synoptic site. [Wikipedia]
